column4: how do i fix my dns? i can ping 8.15.228.161   but not google.com
edit your /etc/resolv.conf
thats there your nameservers are set
i though it was generated for me on the fly
it shoudl be bu perhaps its wrong or your DNS went down
you can try using 4.2.2.1 and 4.2.2.2  should work for now.

nope as long as the new ones are on the top they should be working
by on the top I mean above the bad ones
that worked. possibility these were added when i created a vpn connection?
the bad ones? that could be.
also how did you know 4.2.2.1?
i connected to my vpn and the resolv.conf just was overwritten

its a level 3 dns server. They are free to use and easy to remember. basically anything 4.2.2.1  through 4.2.2.6  They aren't the fastest but they are reliable.  They're actually faster than my isp's so i use them with my own Bind 9 cacing server.
